Detailed Description

The Shape will consist of at least 1 sub path, but may contain more. The sub-path contains the vertices for the shape, while the shape itself contains the rest of the settings/information.

Normalize the shape by scaling the vertices so that the shape radius is 1, and centered at 0,0.

Normalize a shape based on a bounding rect.

Parameters:
bounds Bounding rect. The shape will be centered in this rect, and scaled based on the rect's radius.

REAL AggOO::svg::SVGSubPath::mNormalizationFactor

Scale factor used to normalize the shape. This may be needed to preserve stroke width ratios.
